code: import SockJS from'sockjs-client';import{Stomp}from'@stomp/stompjs';var stompClient=null;export function connectTo(){var socket=new SockJS('/gs-guide-websocket');stompClient=Stomp.over(socket);stompClient.connect({},function(frame){console.log('Connected: '+frame);stompClient.subscribe('/topic/users',function(user){/*showGreeting(JSON.parse(greeting.body).content);*/});});}export function disconnect(){if(stompClient!==null){stompClient.disconnect();}console.log("Disconnected");}export function sendUser(user){stompClient.send("/app/changeUser",{},JSON.stringify(user));}
